entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:12 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 10:12 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: NW 37 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
